content.rendered:
Realme C21 Quick Specs

CPU
MediaTek Helio G35
RAM
  • 4GB
  • LPDDR4X
Battery

Front Camera
5MP
Back Camera
  • 13MP (Main)
  • 2MP (Macro)
  • 2MP (Depth)
